Catalog.ResourceDescription.Name: debug_pusher
Catalog.ResourceDescription.Author: Manuel Warum
Catalog.ResourceDescription.Description: This widget sends arbitrary data to other wirecloud widgets or operators. This data can either be provided manually, or via the HTML5 FileReader API (if the browser supports it). It is designed as a simple UI-based method for development and diagnosis purposes.

Preference.name: to_console
Preference.description: If checked, all data that is sent is also printed to the browser's JavaScript console
Preference.label: Print to console
